system.description:
Allows the caster to change shape into that of an animal. The number of successes in the margin dictate what the shape might be; 1 success gives a small dog, a cat or a hawk, 2 successes a wolf or large dog, 3 a lion, tiger or bear. If the margin is 4 or greater then any natural animal can be chosen.

While shapechanged the caster will be unable to cast spells. They do get the benefit of the natural attacks, movement and senses of the chosen form, and should get a +1d or +2d bonus on anything the animal form would be expected to do better than their normal form. Other than this, the caster retains their own Resistances, Abilities and intelligence.
